org.sd.cluster.job
Class AbstractBatchWorkServer

java.lang.Object
  org.sd.cluster.job.AbstractJob
      org.sd.cluster.job.WorkServer
          org.sd.cluster.job.AbstractBatchWorkServer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Clusterable, Message, Job, Publishable
Direct Known Subclasses:
BatchWorkServer, DataTransferWorkServer
public abstract class AbstractBatchWorkServer
extends WorkServer

A job for serving work to other jobs across a cluster.

Author:
Spence Koehler

doOtherOperate

protected java.lang.String doOtherOperate(java.lang.String[] pieces)
Method to override for handling other commands that add, get, and report (in pieces[0]).

Default behavior is to return a null response.

Returns:
the response string for the designated other operation.

doPreHandleHook

protected boolean doPreHandleHook(Context context)
Called by the handle method only if 'canHandle' returns true before registering this job with the job manager. If this hook returns false, this job will NOT be registered with the job manager and the postHandleHook will not be called.

Specified by:
doPreHandleHook in class WorkServer
